Pre-Game Insights: Wasim Jaffer predicted Tilak Varma's potential inclusion in the ODI side ahead of the Asia Cup and ICC Cricket World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tilak Varma impressed fans with his mature performances on the crease, staying at the crease during difficult situations
Tilak Varma scored 139 runs in three matches at an average of 69.50, with one half-century and a strike rate of 139
Others: Tilak Varma's performance in the West Indies series was his debut international series
